subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim S/RS 20-125/questions and answers/is it very enjoyable or pleasant where your at--pleasant.mp3

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%20S/RS%2020-125/questions%20and%20answers/is%20it%20very%20enjoyable%20or%20pleasant%20where%20your%20at--pleasant.mp3
